trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of control IDs in the current container.
trans-unit.target: 提供检索控件中当前的容器的 Id 的列表的类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter class derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.StringConverter> class.
It provides a list of control IDs to be displayed in a property-editing control in design-time environments.
trans-unit.target: 它提供控件 Id，以在设计时环境中的属性编辑控件中显示的列表。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Generalized Type Conversion](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 实现类型转换器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[通用类型转换](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a collection of control IDs from the container inside the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> object for the specified format context.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个集合的控件内的容器中的 Id <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>指定的格式上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: A context that can be used for more information about the environment that this converter is invoked from.
trans-unit.target: 一种可用于获取有关调用此转换器的环境的详细信息的上下文。

trans-unit.source: This parameter and its properties can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数，其属性可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that represent the control IDs of the controls in the current container.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的当前容器中的控件 Id 的字符串的集合。

trans-unit.source: If no controls are currently in the container, the method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何控件当前容器中，该方法将返回空集合。

trans-unit.source: If the context is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or if there is no current container, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或如果不存在当前容器，此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the collection of standard values that is returned from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，指示集合的标准值是否返回从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>为指定上下文的可能值的独占列表。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*><xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>返回，为独占列表的可能的值;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果还可能有其他值。 </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter supports a set of control ID values that can be selected from a list.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此转换器是否支持的一组可以从列表中选择的控件 ID 值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of control ID values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>调用以查找对象支持的 ID 值的一组公共控件的; 否则为应为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressAssociatedUpdatePanelIDConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
